text: Ila yula mhilisi loyagolole moko wa heye kulutila muji wa Yelusalemu leka kuudumya, Mkulu Nguluwi nakagalula kunuwila kwa heye. Mkulu Nguluwi nakamlonjela yula mhilisi yawele yowadumya wanhu, “Ihega! Uhiluse moko wa hegwe.” Mhilisi wa Mkulu Nguluwi nayali yemile habehi na honhu ha kupululila nyhule ha Alauna, Myebusi.
